name: Racecard (jsanli)
description:
This is a card game meant for 2-8 players which symbolizes a grand prix race (with a few twists). Using different cars, sponsors, action cards, and more, each player has to try to be the fastest to finish the race.  Download the PDF or look at the doc for instructions. Good luck!

https://playingcards.io/wqccfp

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1fxStCM1fWEKXSCdJxPQSKSgtVXN-hZ-KvVmD0MCF3uc/...
